content:
@BWPanda (Peter) It looks like you're looking for someone else to maintain but do you recall if the module is/was in a working state? Did you ever use it?
https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/feeds_para_mapper

backdrop-contrib/feeds_para_mapper
Allows Feeds to import content to Paragraphs' fields. - backdrop-contrib/feeds_para_mapper
Yes, I was using it on a project that didn't take off, but I believe it worked from the initial testing I did. Are you interested in maintaining it?
Maybe. I have a potential project I'm researching and if it goes through I'll definitely be using it.
